title: Castlevania.Lords.of.Shadow.Ultimate.Edition-REVENANTS
description:
Castlevania.Lords.of.Shadow.Ultimate.Edition-REVENANTS

Release date: 2013 
Genre: Action (Slasher) / 3D / 3rd Person 
Publication Type: RePack 
Language: English / Russian / German / French / Italian / Spanish / Brazilian 
Sound language: English 
Crack: enclosing 

System requirements:

Operating system: Windows XP (SP3) / Windows Vista / Windows 7 / Windows 8 
Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo processor with a clock speed of 2.4 GHz / AMD Athlon X2 processor with a clock frequency of 2.7 GHz 
Memory: 1024 MB  2048 MB 
Video: NVIDIA Geforce 8800GTS/ATI Radeon HD 3870 or better DirectX 9.0c compatible 
Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible 
Free hard drive space: 16 GB

Description:

The new part of the famous series, the development of which involved no less famous Hideo Kojima. 
The plot will not be linked with the previous games of a hunter on the evil.

Castlevania: Lords of Shadow tells a grim story of a hero who has lost his beloved. 
Armed with a special cross, the protagonist embarks on a journey to various cities 
and towns in the hope of resurrecting the girl.

To do this, he will have to overcome a few thousand monsters and fight the bosses. 
Battle with each of them requires a special approach and patience.
Features:

* A new chapter. The legendary Castlevania series has found a new form due to the 
studio Mercury Steam. Great graphics, addictive gameplay and an intriguing storyline 
will please both novices and fans of the original game. 
* The star cast. In the development of the game involved Hideo Kojima - 
the creator of the iconic Metal Gear. Give voice to the role of famous 
actors: Robert Carlyle (Robert Carlyle), Patrick Stewart (Patrick Stewart), 
Jason Isaacs (Jason Isaacs) and Natasha McElhone (Natascha McElhone). 
* Holy Cross. In the battle with the creatures of darkness, Gabriel 
uses a special Battle Cross - unique multi-purpose weapon that can 
be converted into a silver stake and whip. In addition, the vampire 
hunter arsenal includes four dozen combat combos. 
* Overseas darkness. Explore the vast and varied world of games, 
battle terrifying monsters and their minions. Gabriel path will pass 
through 50 fully three-dimensional game zones, where it will not 
withstand more than 45 types of enemies.

Repack Features

Do not cut / no recoded 
Average installation time ~ 50 minutes 
RePacked by R G Revenants
